items.sentence: Tom was still angry even after Mary apologized.
Tom will yell at me if I eat all the ice cream.
Tom's ex-wife got married to Mary's ex-husband.
Why are Tom and I the ones who have to do that?
You don't have to hug Tom if you don't want to.
You don't seem to be as sad as Tom seems to be.
Tom has been doing that for a really long time.
Tom has been my best friend since kindergarten.
Tom has finished doing what we asked him to do.
Tom is convinced that Mary is going to do that.
